item.title: Cargo Handling Machineries Required for a Port.
item.description:
Cargo Handling Equipment:

Cranes

Portal Crane, Mobile Crane, Tower crane, Ship to Shore Gantry Crane Rubber tyred Gantry Crane Rail mounted gantry crane Floating cranes

Operational equipment

Tractors, Trailers, Forklifts, Front Loader, Crane Crawlers, Reach stacker, Conveyors, Grabs, Spreader, Weigh Bridge, Bucket Elevator, Grain Hoppers, Bagging Scales, Dust Coil Unit, Bag Units Mobile,

Marine Crafts

Berthing tugs, Lighter towing tugs, Lighters, Pontoons, labour launches, Pilot boats, Patrol Boats, Mooring Boats, Water Barges, SBM Tender,
